history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I would like to travel by bus.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER I'm going to the waterfont s
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Burg, Pennsylvania
TTS Okay, leaving from bike the burgh tours. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER Hello Ron 8 a.m. Tomorrow, please.
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:30 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Best except you got my heating time incorrect.
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:30 pm.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 59 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenue at 10th St near side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenue at 10th St near side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER So traveling at 8 a.m. Please.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER I would like to leave by bus at 8 a.m. With death to waterfont, please.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay to continue.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 44 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Smithfield St at Third avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:37pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER repeat

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 44 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Smithfield St at Third avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:37pm. </prosody> </speak>
